vocab.explain: a member of the intellectual elite

vocab.text_vi: đồ thừa, đồ bỏ, phế phẩm
vocab.explain: to refuse to accept or consider something
vocab.example_en: We put the rejects in this box.

vocab.explain: Huong is always my reliable friend. I can tell her anything I think.

vocab.text_vi: di chuyển (nhân viên, công ty...) đến nơi khác
vocab.explain: The company relocated its head office to Stanford.

vocab.explain: to help someone remember something

vocab.explain: Mum sent me off with a final reminder to be back before 11pm.

vocab.explain: She resigned as director.

vocab.text_vi: bản tóm tắt, sơ yếu lí lịch

vocab.explain: The job is open to applicants with over two years' experience in retail.

vocab.explain: Amazon is the largest onlineretailer in the world.

vocab.explain: to stop doing your job, especially because you have reached a particular age
vocab.example_en: She was forced to retire early from teaching because of ill health.

vocab.explain: The costs of absenteeism, the productivity loss which occurs if workers are on sick leave.

vocab.explain: It is a good opportunity to socialize with new colleagues.

vocab.explain: My mailbox is full of spams.

vocab.explain: to become an expert in a particular area of work

vocab.explain: an daministrator in charge

vocab.explain: Your mortgage payment should not be more than 25% of your take-home pay.

vocab.explain: As a pianist, she’s a brilliant technician, but she lacks passion.

vocab.explain: The company will be holding a teleconference to announce a major partnership.

vocab.text_vi: nhiệm kỳ, sự nắm giữ một chức vụ nào

vocab.explain: The agreement was terminated immediately.

vocab.text_vi: việc cân bằng hai thứ đối ngược nhau; sự thỏa hiệp

vocab.explain: Don't throw trash on the street.

vocab.text_vi: kiểm tra lại, thẩm tra, xác minh
vocab.explain: to check that something is true or accurate
vocab.example_en: We have no way of verifying his story.

vocab.explain: Peter was duly elected vice-president the following June.

vocab.explain: At the front door is a whiteboard marking the day's events.

vocab.explain: We only sell wholesale, not to the public.

vocab.text_vi: có lợi cho các bên liên quan

vocab.explain: These safety standards apply to all workplaces.

vocab.explain: The book is carefully wrapped.
